pr_title: [GEOT-6600] getBounds fails for compound 3d crs in postgis jdbc store

timeline.bodyText: Would be best if the tests run in both cases. Could you add a new test that enables estimated extents in a try/finally block instead?
timeline.author: aaime

timeline.bodyText: This code is for all databases, where an exact match is required. In the PostGIS test you're enabling estimated extends and thus get back a lower precision bbox. See my other comment, better to make a new PostGIS specific test method instead.
timeline.author: aaime

timeline.message: [GEOT-6600] getBounds fails for compound 3d crs in postgis jdbc store
